title: How to Enable Inspect Element in Microsoft Edge

steps.title: Open Microsoft Edge.
steps.content: Open Microsoft Edge. By default, the Microsoft Edge icon is visible on the taskbar. It's the blue "e" sign. Alternatively, you can run it from the search bar.

steps.title: Access Microsoft Edge's secret settings.
steps.content: Access Microsoft Edge's secret settings. Secret settings (or flags) can be viewed in Microsoft Edge by entering about:flags in the browser's search bar.

steps.title: Enable View mode and Inspect Element.
steps.content: Enable View mode and Inspect Element. By clicking the first box, "Show View source and Inspect Element in context menu", there will now be extra available options, if the right mouse button is clicked anywhere in a website. Changes don't have to be saved.

steps.title: Press F12.
steps.content: Press F12 . Alternatively, Developer Tools or Inspect Element can be enabled automatically by pressing the F12 key on the keyboard.
